attributes.action: Make the owners of car boot sites responsible for all criminal activities taking place at them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At many car boot sites can be found people selling counterfeit/fake items, cheap ( smuggled) tobacco and dangerouus weapons.If the owner of the site was held jointly liable for any such sales then enforcement would be much easier as they woould also have the responsibility for ensuring all sellers where trading legally.
